    Function reference

    All functions

    clear_all_user_passwords()
    Clear all user passwords
    clear_user_password()
    Clear the password for a user in the connections database
    close_bo_connection()
    Close connection to the BO server
    close_bo_document()
    Close BO Webi document
    delete_bo_spreadsheet()
    Delete a spreadsheet from BO
    get_bo_control_details()
    Get input controls for document or report
    get_bo_control_selection()
    Get the selection state of a document control
    get_bo_data_provider_data()
    Get data directly from a document data provider
    get_bo_data_provider_details()
    Title
    get_bo_document_details()
    Get the meta data for a Webi document
    get_bo_item()
    Retrieve BO item proerties
    get_bo_item_id()
    Return Id from item properties or from numeric value
    get_bo_report_data()
    Get data from a BO document report tab
    get_bo_report_details()
    Get report details from document
    get_bo_report_inputs()
    Get inputs from a report table
    get_bo_spreadsheet_details()
    Get spreadsheet properties from BO
    get_user_password()
    Title
    get_user_rights()
    Get user rights on the BO server
    my_log_colorize()
    Title
    open_bo_connection()
    Open a connection to a BO server. You can keep parameters in environment variables
    post_bo_spreadsheet()
    POST a new spreadsheet to BO folder
    put_bo_spreadsheet()
    PUT an existing spreadsheet to BO folder
    refresh_bo_data_provider()
    Title
    set_user_password()
    Set the password for a user in the connections database
    split_message()
    Colorize a string by embedded tags starting with ';'
    upload_bo_spreadsheet()
    Title
    upload_df()
    Upload a dataframe
